meanings.definition: Trousers: an outer garment covering the body from the waist to the ankles, with a separate part for each leg.
meanings.sent1: He wore comfortable trouse to the party.
meanings.sent2: She bought new trouse for the upcoming trip.
meanings.sent3: The trouse he picked had a funny pattern on them.
meanings.sent4: Her colorful trouse stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The old man's trouse were patched and worn from years of use.

meanings.definition: Trouser: to put on or wear trousers.
meanings.sent1: He will trouse up before heading out.
meanings.sent2: She likes to trouse quickly in the morning.
meanings.sent3: They decided to trouse early for the event.
meanings.sent4: The kids troused up for the school play.
meanings.sent5: She always trouses carefully to look presentable.
